taskDescription:
Find a report on the last match of the best-known sports team in your city. Translate it into your main foreign language using an NMT system. What changes in the source text would have prevented errors in the transmission of meaning or in the wording of the target text? Which of the problems detected are related to the following issues?

  • Word choice.
  • Style issues.
  • Cultural or referential issues.
placeholderText: In texts of this nature, the use of figurative language, nicknames and any reference-loaded elements within the source culture can be a challenge for an MT system.
